text: And of the priests, they that usurped the office of the priesthood and were not found: the sons of Habaiah, or Hobaiah. Obdia, the sons of Hakkoz. Akkos, the sons of Jaddus, who married Augia one of the daughters of Barzillai. Another reading is, Phaezeldaeus. Zorzelleus, and was called after his name.
